result.title: enCOMPASS ecosystem report
result.description: Mapping of relevant actors and stakeholders. Analysis of social, environmental and business requirements, also beyond the two pilots; identification of possible business models for exploitation of enCOMPASS, based on D7.1. An update will be produced at month 36, focusing on the various geographic areas of Europe, starting from the countries of the project partners and outlining possible business plans.
